alert.note: Alert for Wood (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 01 at 9:03PM CDT until further notice by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Yellow River at Pittsville affecting Wood County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...No flooding is currently forecast. * WHERE...Yellow River at Pittsville. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Riverside Park is flooded and there is widespread lowland flooding in the area. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 12.6 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 13.1 feet on 05/18/2017. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Sunday morning (April 2). Sunday afternoon.
